DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence of divalproex sodium 125 MG delayed release tablets.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Divalproex Sodium 125 MG Delayed Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant findings on physical examination, medical history or laboratory tests on screening Positive test for HIV or Hepatitis B and C History of sensitivity to valproic acid or related compounds
